2882:17: none“> evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma|
2882:18: gṛdhrakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ mahatā ca bodhisattvagaṇena|
2882:25: none“> tatra bhagavān subhūtim āmantrayate sma||
2882:32: none“> rūpaṃ subhūte abhā vo nābhāvaḥ sadbhāvaḥ|
2882:33: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ subhūte abhāvo nābhāvaḥ sadbhāvaḥ|
2882:34: cakṣū rūpāṇi ca cakṣurvijñānaṃ śrotraṃ śabdāḥ śrotravijñānaṃ ghrāṇaṃ gandhā ghrāṇavijñānaṃ jihvā rasā jihvāvijñānaṃ kāyaḥ spraṣṭavyāni kāyavi jñānaṃ mano dharmāḥ manovijñānaṃ subhūte abhāvo nābhāvaḥ sadbhāvaḥ||
2882:41: none“> evaṃ tad rūpaṃ triparivartena bālapṛthagjanā yathābhūtam aprajānantas tad rūpam abhiniviśante'bhinirvartayanty
2882:59: none“> ddhayānena vā tāvan na niryāsyanti|
2882:65: none“> uta narakeṣu tiryakṣu preteṣu deveṣu manuṣyeṣu||
2882:72: none“> evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ subhūte abhāvo nābhāvaḥ sadbhāvaḥ|
2882:77: none“> śabdāḥ śrotravijñānaṃ ghrāṇaṃ gandhā ghrāṇavijñānaṃ
2882:81: none“> jihvā rasā jihvāvijñānaṃ kāyaḥ spraṣṭavyāni kāyavijñānaṃ
2882:85: none“> mano dharmāḥ manovijñānaṃ subhūte abhāvo nābhāvaḥ sadbhāvaḥ|
2882:86: evaṃ tan manovijñānaṃ triparivartena bālapṛthagjanā yathābhūtam aprajānantas tan manovijñānam abhiniviśante'bhinirvartayanty avacchādayanti|
2882:97: none“> srāvakayānena pratyekabuddhayānena vā tāvan na niryāsyanti|
2882:117: yad uta narakeṣu tiryakṣu preteṣu deveṣu
2882:128: none“> evaṃ ca tad rūpaṃ triparivartena paṇḍitā yathābhūtaṃ prajānanto nābhiniviśante nābhinirvartayanti prakāśayanti|
2882:139: evaṃ cānabhiniviśanto'nabhinirvartayantaḥ prakāśayanto jarāmaraṇaṃ na pratyanubhavanti|
2882:140: yad uta narakeṣu tiryakṣu preteṣu deveṣu manuṣyeṣu||
2882:147: none“> evaṃ vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ ca triparivartena
2882:151: none“> paṇḍitā yathābhūtaṃ prajānanto nābhiniviśante nābhinirvartayanti
2882:157: kaḥ punar vādaḥ śrāvakayānena pratyekabuddhayānena vā|
2882:172: yad uta narakeṣu tiryakṣu preteṣu deveṣu manuṣyeṣu||
2882:179: none“> rūpaṃ subhūte utpadyate ca vyayate ca|
2882:190: none“> prajānato bodhisattvasya yo rūpasyānutpādaḥ sa saṃpadyate||
2882:197: none“> evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ subhūte utpadyate ca vyayate ca|
2882:200: tāṃ punar anutpādaprakṛtiṃ vijñānasya yathābhūtaṃ prajānato bodhisattvasya yo vijñānasyānutpādaḥ sa saṃpadyate||
2882:207: none“> 1 yaḥ kaścit subhūte evaṃ vaded rūpam ātmā vātmīyaṃ veti tam ahaṃ bāhyaṃ pṛthagjanapakṣāvasthitaṃ mithyādṛṣṭikaṃ vadāmi||
2882:214: none“> yaḥ kaścit subhūte evaṃ vaded vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam ātmā vātmīyaṃ veti tam apy ahaṃ bāhyaṃ pṛthagjana-
2882:234: none“> 2 yo'pi subhūte evaṃ vaded rūpaṃ pūrvakṛtahetukaṃ veśvaranirmāṇahetukaṃ vāhetupratyayaṃ vā tam apy ahaṃ bāhyaṃ pṛthagjanapakṣāvasthitaṃ mithyādṛṣṭikaṃ vadāmi||
2882:241: none“> yaḥ kaścit subhū te evaṃ vaded vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā
2882:245: none“> vijñānaṃ pūrvakṛtahetukaṃ veśvaranirmāṇahetukaṃ vāhetupratyayaṃ vā tam apy ahaṃ bāhyaṃ pṛthagjanapakṣāvasthitaṃ mithyādṛṣṭikaṃ vadāmi||
2882:252: none“> 3 yo'pi subhūte evaṃ vaded rūpaṇālakṣaṇaṃ rūpam anubhavalakṣaṇā vedanā saṃjānanālakṣaṇā saṃjñā abhisaṃskāralakṣaṇāḥ saṃskārā vijā nanālakṣaṇaṃ vijñānaṃ
2882:256: none“> tam apy ahaṃ bāhyād bāhyaṃ pṛthagjanapakṣāvasthitaṃ
2882:267: none“> 4 yo'pi subhūte evaṃ vaded rūpaṃ duḥkham apraśāntaṃ rūpanirodhaḥ sukhaṃ śāntam iti tam apy ahaṃ bāhyād bāhyaṃ
2882:287: none“> yo'pi subhūte evaṃ vaded vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ
2882:291: none“> duḥkham apraśāntaṃ vijñānanirodhaḥ sukhaṃ śāntam iti tam apy ahaṃ bāhyād bāhyaṃ pṛthagjanapakṣāvasthitaṃ mithyādṛṣṭikaṃ vadāmi||
2882:298: none“> 5 yo'pi subhūte evaṃ vaden nāsty eva rūpam iti tam apy ahaṃ bāhyād bāhyaṃ pṛthagjanapakṣāvasthitaṃ mithyādṛṣṭikaṃ
2882:309: none“> yo'pi subhūte evaṃ vaden nāsty eva vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā
2882:313: none“> vijñānam iti tam apy ahaṃ bāhyād bāhyaṃ pṛthagjanapakṣāvasthitaṃ mithyādṛṣṭikaṃ vadāmi||
2882:320: none“> 6 yo'pi subhūte evaṃ vaded yā rūpasya niḥsvabhāvatā bhagavatā deśitānutpādo'nirodha ādiśāntatā prakṛtiparinirvṛtatā sarvā sā deśanā nirabhisaṃdhikā nirabhiprāyā
2882:333: none“> yathārutam eva jñeyeti tam apy ahaṃ bāhyād bāhyaṃ pṛthagjanapakṣāvasthitaṃ mithyādṛṣṭikaṃ vadāmi||
2882:340: none“> yo'pi subhūte evaṃ vaded yā vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya niḥsvabhāvatā bhagavatā deśitānutpādo'nirodha ādiśāntatā prakṛtiparinirvṛtatā sarvā sā deśanā nirabhisaṃdhikā nirabhiprāyā yathārutam eva jñeyeti tam apy ahaṃ bāhyād bāhyaṃ pṛthagjanapakṣāvasthitaṃ
2882:351: none“> asti subhūte rūpaṃ yad rūpasyānabhiniveśāyānutpādāyānabhi- saṃkhyānāya saṃvartate|
2882:352: asti tad rūpaṃ yad rūpasya saṃkleśāya
2882:361: none“> yad rūpasya vyavadānāya vittatvāya saṃvartate||
2882:368: none“> asti subhūte vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yad vijñanasyānabhiniveśāyānutpādāyānabhisaṃkhyānāya saṃvartate|
2882:369: asti subhūte vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yad
2882:373: none“> vijñānasya saṃkleśāya saṃniśrayāya saṃpraveśāya saṃvartate|
2882:374: asti vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yad vijñānasya vyavadānāya vittatvāya saṃvartate||
2882:387: none“> asti subhūte rūpaṃ yad bodhisattvānāṃ prahīṇaṃ parijñātaṃ deśanāya vittatvāya saṃvartate|
2882:388: asti subhūte rūpaṃ yat prahīṇaṃ parijñātaṃ saṃdarśanavittatvāya saṃvartate|
2882:389: asti subhūte rūpaṃ yat prahīṇaṃ parijñātaṃ śukladharmasamanvayāya dharmavaśavartitvāya mahāsukhavihārāya saṃvartate||
2882:396: none“> asti subhūte vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yad bodhisattvānāṃ prahīṇaṃ parijñātaṃ deśanāya vittatvāya saṃvartate|
2882:397: asti subhūte vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ
2882:401: none“> yat prahīṇaṃ parijñātaṃ saṃdarśanavittatvāya saṃvartate|
2882:405: none“> asti subhūte vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yad bodhisattvānāṃ prahīṇaṃ parijñātaṃ śukladharmasamanvayāya
2882:416: none“> yaḥ kaścit subhūte bodhisattvo rūpe rūpamātraṃ duḥkhamātraṃ na samanupaśyati sa rūpa ātmānam upalabhate|
2882:417: yo rūpa ātmānam upalabhate sa rūpa ātmadṛṣṭim upalabhate|
2882:418: yo rūpa ātmadṛṣṭim upalabhate sa rūpe sarvam upalabhate|
2882:419: yo rūpe sarvam upalabhate sa rūpe sarvaṃ nopalabhate|
2882:420: yo rūpe sarvam upalabhamānaḥ sarvaṃ nopalabhate sa tasya bha-
2882:434: sa tam upalambhaṃ niśritya śrāvakayānena pratyekabuddhayānena vā tāvan na niryāti|
2882:442: none“> yaḥ kaścit subhūte bodhisattvo vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne vijñānamātraṃ duḥkhamātraṃ na samanupaśyati sa vijñāna ātmānam upalabhate|
2882:443: yo vijñāna ātmānam upalabhate sa vijñāna ātmadṛṣṭim upalabhate|
2882:444: yo vijñāna ātmadṛṣṭim upalabhate sa vijñāne sarvam upalabhate|
2882:448: none“> yo vijñāne sarvam upalabhate sa vijñāne sarvaṃ nopalabhate|
2882:449: yo vijñāne sarvam upalabhamānaḥ sarvaṃ nopalabhate sa tasya bhavaty upalambhaḥ pariniṣpannaḥ|
2882:450: sa tam upalambhaṃ niśritya śrāvakayānena pratyekabuddhayānena vā tāvan na niryāti|
2882:458: none“> yaḥ punaḥ subhūte rūpe rūpamātraṃ duḥkhamātraṃ samanupaśyati sa rūpa ātmānaṃ nopalabhate|
2882:463: none“> nopalabhate sa rūpa ātmadṛṣṭiṃ nopalabhate|
2882:464: yo rūpa ātmadṛṣṭiṃ nopalabhate sa rūpe sarvaṃ nopalabhate| yo rūpe
2882:468: none“> sarvaṃ nopalabhate sa rūpe sarvaṃ upalabhate|
2882:469: yo rūpe sarvam anupalabhamānaḥ sarvam upalabhate sa tasya bhavaty upalambhaḥ pariniṣpannaḥ|
2882:474: none“> śrā vakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā niryāti no tu
2882:491: none“> yaḥ punaḥ subhūte vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne vijñānamātraṃ duḥkhamātraṃ samanupaśyati sa vijñāna ātmānaṃ nopalabhate|
2882:492: yo vijñāna ātmānaṃ nopalabhate sa vijñāna ātmadṛṣṭiṃ nopalabhate|
2882:493: yo vijñāna ātmadṛṣṭiṃ nopalabhate sa vijñāne sarvaṃ nopalabhate|
2882:498: none“> nopalabhate sa vijñāne sarvaṃ upalabhate|
2882:503: none“> anupalabhamānaḥ sarvam upalabhate sa tasya bhavaty upalambhaḥ pariniṣpannaḥ|
2882:508: none“> vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā niryāti no tu mahāyānena||
2882:515: none“> yaḥ kaścit subhūte rūpe'bhūtaparikalpamātraṃ bhrāntimātraṃ
2882:519: none“> na samanupaśyati sa rūpe rūpam upalabhate|
2882:524: none“> upalabhate sa rūpe rūpadṛṣṭim upalabhate|
2882:529: none“> upalabhate sa rūpe sarvam upalabhate|
2882:530: yo rūpe sarvam upalabhate sa rūpe sarvaṃ nopalabhate|
2882:531: yo rūpe sarvam upalabhamānaḥ sarvaṃ nopalabhate sa tasya bhavaty upalambhaḥ pariniṣpannaḥ|
2882:532: sa tam upalambhaṃ niśritya śrāvakayānena pratyekabuddhayānena vā tāvan na niryāti|
2882:540: none“> yaḥ kaścit subhūte vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne
2882:563: yo vijñāne vijñānadṛṣṭim upalabhate sa vijñāne sarvam upalabhate|
2882:564: yo vijñāne sarvam upalabhate sa vijñāne sarvaṃ nopalabhate|
2882:565: yo vijñāne sarvam upalabhamānaḥ sarvaṃ nopalabhate sa tasya bhavaty
2882:570: sa tam upalambhaṃ niśritya śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā tāvan na niryāti|
2882:578: none“> yas tu subhūte rūpe'bhūtaparikalpamātraṃ bhrāntimātraṃ samanupaśyati sa rūpe rūpaṃ nopalabhate|
2882:583: none“> nopalabhate sa rūpe rūpadṛṣṭiṃ nopalabhate|
2882:584: yo rūpe rūpadṛṣṭiṃ nopalabhate sa rūpe sarvaṃ nopalabhate| yo rūpe
2882:588: none“> sarvam nopalabhate sa rūpe sarvam upalabhate| yo rūpe
2882:592: none“> sarvam anupalabhamānaḥ sarvam upalabhate sa tasya bhavaty
2882:597: sa tam upalambhaṃ niśritya mahāyānena tāvan niryāti|
2882:598: kaḥ punar vādaḥ śrāvakayānena pratyekabuddhayānena vā||
2882:605: none“> yas tu vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte
2882:609: none“> abhūtaparikalpamātraṃ bhrāntimātraṃ samanupaśyati sa vijñāne
2882:627: none“> bhate sa vijñāne vijñānadṛṣṭiṃ nopalabhate|
2882:628: yo vijñāne vijñānadṛṣṭiṃ nopalabhate sa vijñāne sarvaṃ nopalabhate|
2882:632: none“> yo vijñāne sarvaṃ nopalabhate sa vijñāne sarvam upalabhate|
2882:633: yo vijñāne sarvam anupalabhamānaḥ sarvam upalabhate sa tasya bhavaty upalambhaḥ pariniṣpannaḥ|
2882:634: sa tam upalambhaṃ niśritya mahāyānena tāvan niryāti|
2882:635: kaḥ punar vādaḥ śrāvakayānena pratyekabuddhayānena vā||
2882:657: none“> evaṃ vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvasya yathārutābhiniveśavyāhārasamudācāraḥ satkāyadṛṣṭisamudācāraḥ punarbhavatṛṣṇāsamudācāro vibhavaparyeṣṭisamudācāro vijñāne'parijñātaliṅgam||
2882:679: none“> evaṃ vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte
2882:708: none“> trīṇīmāni subhūte rūpe bodhisattvasya cittabījāni yani pratyayagṛhītāni vyavadānāya saṃvartante|
2882:716: none“> trīṇīmāni subhūte vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvasya cittabījāni yāni pratyayagṛhītāni
2882:732: none“> trīṇīmāni subhūte rūpe bodhisattvena cittāny utpādayitavyāni|
2882:734: sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvaḥ tadrūpe cittotpādam
2882:747: none“> anutpādaṃ mahotpādaṃ samanupaśyati sa evaṃ samanupaśyan kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate||
2882:754: none“> trīṇīmāni subhūte vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne bodhisattvena cittāny utpādayitavyāni|
2882:760: sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvaḥ tadvijñāne cittotpādam anutpādaṃ mahotpādaṃ
2882:764: none“> samanupaśyati sa evaṃ samanupaśyan kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate||
2882:771: none“> rūpaṃ sacet subhūte bodhisattvo'stitayā tathāstitayā nāstitayā
2882:775: none“> vā samanupaśyaty atattvajño bodhisattva iti veditavyaḥ|
2882:782: none“> evaṃ vedanāṃ samjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ sacet subhūte
2882:786: none“> bodhisattvo'sti tayā tathāstitayā nāstitayā vā samanupaśyaty
2882:807: none“> nāstitayā samanupaśyati tattvajño bodhisattva iti veditavyaḥ||
2882:814: none“> vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ sacet subhūte bodhisattvo'nastitayātathāstitayānastinā stitayā samanupaśyati
2882:825: none“> rūpe subhūte bodhisattvasya cittaṃ samādhātukāmasya rūpam
2882:829: none“> adhimucyamānasya tac cittaṃ rūpa uccalati saṃcalati vicalati duradhimokṣo bodhisattvo veditavyaḥ||
2882:836: none“> vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvasya cittaṃ samādhātukāmasya vijñānam adhimucyamānasya vijñāne tac cittam uccalati saṃcalati vicalati
2882:847: none“> rūpe subhūte bodhisattvaś cittaṃ samādhātukāmas tac ca rūpam
2882:851: none“> adhimucyamāno rūpe cittaṃ na badhnāti na saṃbadhnāti na vibadhnāti svadhimokṣo bodhisattvo veditavyaḥ||
2882:858: none“> vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte
2882:862: none“> bodhisattvaś cittaṃ samādhātukāmas tac ca vijñānam
2882:866: none“> adhimucyamāno vijñāne cittaṃ na badhnāti na saṃbadhnāti na vibadhnāti svadhimokṣo bodhisattvo veditavyaḥ||
2882:883: none“> nirvāṇānaikāntikatvāya ca pratipanno bodhisattvaḥ samyakpratipanno
2882:888: evaṃ ca samyakpratipanno bodhisattvaḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate||
2882:895: none“> vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte alakṣaṇadharmaparijñāyai duḥkhapraśamāya nirvāṇānaikāntikatvāya ca pratipanno bodhisattvaḥ samyakpratipanno veditavyaḥ|
2882:896: evaṃ ca samyakpratipanno bodhisattvaḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate||
2882:922: none“> rūpe subhūte nirālokaṃ samantālokaṃ tadāśrayaṃ tatpraveśaṃ
2882:926: none“> ca dharmaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānan bodhisattvaḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate||
2882:933: none“> vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte nirālokaṃ samantālokaṃ tadāśrayaṃ tatpraveśaṃ ca dharmaṃ
2882:946: none“> yathābhūtaṃ prajānan bodhisattvaḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisambudhyate||
2882:972: none“> rūpe subhūte rūpaṃ parimārgamāṇo bodhisattvaḥ tac cānupalabhamāno rūpam anābhāsīkṛtya rūpadharmasamatāṃ ca prati vidhya kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate||
2882:979: none“> vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte vijñānaṃ parimārgamāṇo bodhisattvaḥ tac cānupalabhamāno vijñānam anābhāsīkṛtya vijñānadharmasamatāṃ ca pratividhya kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate||
2882:1005: none“> rūpe subhūte abhāvakuśalo bodhisattvo rūpavibhavena samanvāgato rūpadharmadhātuniścalaḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ
2882:1022: none“> vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte abhāvakuśalo bodhisattvo vijñānavibhavena samanvāgato
2882:1026: none“> vijñānadharmadhātuniścalaḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyato||
2882:1052: none“> rūpe subhūte nirartham apārthaṃ mahārthaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānan bodhisattvaḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ abhisaṃbudhyate||

2882:1102: none“> vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvena pañca rāgān parijñāya parivarjayitavyāḥ|
2882:1103: vitarkarāgaḥ pratarkarāgo vikalparāgo rāgo mahārāgaś ca||

2882:1122: sa tena rūpopalambhānupalambhena sarvaprakāraṃ rūpam abhibhūya niryāti yad utānuttarāyai
2882:1133: none“> vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattva imān pañca rāgān parivarjayitvā vijñānasvabhāvaṃ

2882:1433: none“> sattva imāḥ pañca dṛṣṭīḥ parivarjayitvā vijñānasvabhāvaṃ nopalabhate|
2882:1435: vijñāne vijñānam anupalabhamāno vijñāne vijñānam upalabhate|

2882:1437: sa tena vijñānopalambhānupalambhena sarvaprakāraṃ vijñānam abhibhūya niryāti yad utānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye||
2882:1444: none“> rūpe subhūte bodhisattvena pañca vimatīḥ parijñāya parivarjayitavyāḥ|
2882:1448: none“> dharmavimatir gatiduḥkhavimatir nirvāṇabuddhabodhisattvadharmavimatir vimatir mahāvimatiś ca||
2882:1455: none“> vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvena
2882:1460: dharmavimatir gatiduḥkhavimatir nirvāṇabuddhabodhisattvadharmavimatir vimatir mahāvimatiś ca|
2882:1467: none“> rūpe subhūte bodhisattva imāḥ pañca vimatīḥ parivarjayitvā rūpasvabhāvaṃ nopalabhate|

2882:1478: none“> vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattva imāḥ pañca vimatīḥ parivarjayitvā vijñānasvabhāvaṃ nopalabhate|
2882:1493: vijñāne vijñānam anupalabhamāno vijñāne vijñānam upalabhate|
2882:1494: yo vijñāne vijñānopalambhaḥ sa eva vijñāne vijñānānupalambhaḥ|
2882:1495: sa tena vijñānopalambhānupalambhena sarvaprakāraṃ vijñānam abhibhūya niryāti yad utānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye||
2882:1502: none“> rūpe subhūte bodhisattvaḥ paryeṣan rūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayan rūpe kāyavāṅmanaskarma pariśodhayaṃs tad rūpaṃ yathārutaṃ yathādṛṣṭi yathākhyātaṃ paryeṣate dharmaṃ deśayati|
2882:1512: none“> rūpe subhūte bodhisattvaḥ paryeṣan rūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayan rūpe kāyavāṅmanaskarma pariśodhayaṃs tad rūpam ayathārutam ayathādṛṣṭi ayathākhyātaṃ paryeṣate dharmaṃ deśayati|
2882:1535: none“> vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvaḥ paryeṣan vijñānaṃ dharmaṃ deśayan vijñāne kāyavāṅmanaskarma pariśodhayaṃs tad vijñānaṃ yathārutaṃ yathādṛṣṭi yathākhyātaṃ paryeṣate dharmaṃ deśayati|
2882:1545: none“> vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvaḥ paryeṣan vijñānaṃ dharmaṃ deśayan vijñāne kāyavāṅmaskarma pariśodhayaṃs tad vijñānam ayathārutam ayathādṛṣṭi ayathākhyātaṃ paryeṣate dharmaṃ deśayati|
2882:1572: none“> rūpe subhūte bodhisattvaś cittaṃ samādhātukāmaḥ tac ca rūpam adhyātmam adhimucyamāno dvaye dvayam upalabhate|
2882:1574: tatra yo bodhisattvo rūpe yathādhimokṣyam adhimokṣam avavadate yathādhimokṣaṃ vādhimokṣyam avavadate rūpe'samyagavavaditā
2882:1604: none“> adhimokṣarūpāt pṛthaglakṣaṇaṃ vidyate nānādhi muktānāṃ sattvānāṃ samādhimokṣye'bhinnāni darśanāny upalabhyeran|
2882:1612: none“> bālapṛthagjanāś ca rūpe tattvadarśino bhaveyuḥ|
2882:1613: na ca siddhe yukte nirvikalpādhimokṣe cādhimokṣyarūpam anuvarteta|
2882:1614: yasmāt tarhi subhūte nānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ samādhimokṣye bhinnāni darśanāni pravartante|
2882:1622: na ca bālapṛthagjanā rūpe tattvadarśino bhavanti|
2882:1638: nānyatra sanimitadṛṣṭiko rūpādhimokṣas tathā yathā samutpannaṃ tad adhimokṣyarūpam|
2882:1647: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty adhimokṣyarūpe saty adhimokṣarūpaṃ yujyate nāsatīti viditvādhimokṣarūpabhrāntim upalabhate|
2882:1655: none“> sa dvayarūpasaṃjñāṃ vibhāvayitvā sarvarūpaṃ nopalabhate|
2882:1663: pūrvam eva cānena rūpabhrāntyabhrāntidharmāḥ samudānītā bhavanti|
2882:1664: sa rūpe'bhrāntidharmān abhrāntiniṣyandadharmāṃś ca niśritya sarvabuddhadharmān bhāvayati|
2882:1684: evaṃ rūpe'vavadamāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ samyagavavaditā bhavati||
2882:1691: none“> vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvaś cittaṃ samādhātukāmaḥ tac ca vijñānam adhyātmam adhimucyamāno dvaye dvayam upalabhate|
2882:1693: tatra yo bodhisattvo vijñāne yathādhimokṣyam adhimokṣam avavadate yathādhimokṣaṃ vādhimokṣyam avavadate vijñāne'samyagavavaditā bodhisattvo veditavyaḥ||
2882:1701: na hi subhūte adhimokṣyavijñānam adhimokṣavijñānāt pṛthaglakṣaṇaṃ vidyate|
2882:1702: sacet subhūte adhimokṣyavijñānam adhimokṣavijñānāt pṛthaglakṣaṇaṃ vidyate nānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ samādhimokṣye'bhinnāni darśanāny upalabhyeran|
2882:1718: na ca siddhe yukte nirvikalpādhimokṣe cādhimokṣyavijñānam anuvarteta|
2882:1719: yasmāt tarhi subhūte nānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ samādhimokṣye bhinnāni darśanāni pravartante|
2882:1721: na ca bālapṛthagjanā vijñāne tattvadarśino bhavanti|
2882:1728: nānyatra sanimittadṛṣṭiko vijñānādhimokṣas tathā yathā samutpannaṃ tad adhimokṣyavijñānam|
2882:1737: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty adhimokṣyavijñāne saty adhimokṣavijñānaṃ yujyate nāsatīti viditvādhimokṣavi-
2882:1757: pūrvam eva cānena vijñānabhrāntyabhrāntidharmāḥ samudānītā bhavanti|
2882:1758: sa vijñāne'bhrāntidharmān abhrāntiniṣyandadharmāṃś ca niśritya sarvabuddhadharmān bhāvayati|
2882:1765: none“> evaṃ vijñāne'vavadamāno bodhisattvaḥ samyagavavaditā veditavyaḥ||
2882:1772: none“> rūpe subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcākārā maitrī bhāvayitavyā|
2882:1777: none“> maitrī lokottarasukhopasaṃhārā maitrī maitrī mahāmaitrī ca||
2882:1790: none“> vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvena
2882:1795: saddharmopasaṃhārā maitrī laukikasukhopasaṃhārā maitrī lokottarasukhopasaṃhārā maitrī maitrī mahāmaitrī ca||
2882:1802: none“> rūpe subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcākārā karuṇā bhāvayitavyā|
2882:1803: asaṃgrahakaruṇā saṃyogakaruṇāpy asaṃyogakaruṇā karuṇā mahākaruṇā ca||
2882:1810: none“> vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvena
2882:1815: asaṃgrahakaruṇā saṃyogakaruṇāpy asaṃyogakaruṇā karuṇā mahākaruṇā ca||

2882:1823: saddharmaprasādābhiṣyandanā nugrahānumodanā muditā laukikasukhābhiṣyandanānugrahānumodanā muditā lokottarasukhābhiṣyandanānugrahānumodanā muditā muditā mahāmuditā ca||

2882:1845: none“> rūpe subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcakāropekṣā bhāvayitavyā|
2882:1859: none“> vedānāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvena
2882:1871: none“> rūpe subhūte dānapāramitāyāṃ prayuktena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcākāraṃ dānaṃ bhāvayitavyam pratijñādānam āmiṣābhayapratipattidānaṃ dharmapratipattidānaṃ dānaṃ mahādānaṃ ca||
2882:1878: none“> vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte dānapāramitāyāṃ prayuktena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcākāraṃ dānaṃ bhāvayitavyam|
2882:1890: none“> rūpe subhūte śīlapāramitāyāṃ prayuktena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcākāraṃ śīlaṃ bhāvayitavyam|
2882:1891: samādānasāṃketikaśīlaṃ dhyānasaṃvaraśīlam anāsravasaṃvaraśīlaṃ śīlaṃ mahāśīlaṃ ca||
2882:1904: none“> vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte śīlapāramitāyāṃ prayuktena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcākāraṃ śīlaṃ bhāvayitavyam|
2882:1905: samādānasāṃketikaśīlaṃ dhyānasaṃvaraśīlam anāsravasaṃvaraśīlaṃ śīlaṃ mahāśīlaṃ ca||
2882:1912: none“> rūpe subhūte kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ prayuktena bodhisattvena
2882:1917: sattvāpakāramarṣaṇā kṣāntir duḥkhādhivāsanakṣāntir dharmanidhyānakṣāntiḥ kṣāntir mahākṣāntiś ca||
2882:1924: none“> vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ prayuktena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcākārā kṣāntir bhāvayitavyā|
2882:1925: sattvāpakāramarṣaṇā kṣāntir duḥkhādhivāsanakṣāntir dharmanidhyānakṣāntiḥ kṣāntir mahākṣāntiś ca||
2882:1932: none“> rūpe subhūte vīryapāramitāyāṃ prayuktena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcākāraṃ vīryaṃ bhāvayitavyam|
2882:1933: uddeśasvādhyāyacittavīryaṃ sarvadoṣaparivarjanavīryaṃ sarvaguṇaparigrahavīryaṃ vīryaṃ mahāvīryaṃ ca||
2882:1940: none“> vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte
2882:1953: none“> vīryapāramitāyāṃ prayuktena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcākāraṃ vīryaṃ bhāvayitavyam|
2882:1954: uddeśasvādhyāyacittavīryaṃ sarvadoṣaparivarjanavīryaṃ sarvaguṇaparigrahavīryaṃ vīryaṃ mahāvīryaṃ ca||
2882:1961: none“> rūpe subhūte dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prayuktena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcākāraṃ dhyānaṃ bhāvayitavyam|
2882:1969: none“> vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prayuktena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcākāraṃ dhyānaṃ bhāvayitavyam|
2882:1970: vyañjanasāpekṣa kuśaladhyānaṃ vyañjananirapekṣādiviśuddhalaukikakuśaladhyānaṃ lokottarakuśaladhyānaṃ dhyānaṃ mahādhyānaṃ ca||
2882:1977: none“> rūpe subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ prayuktena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcākārā prajñā bhāvayitavyā|
2882:1978: vyañjanasāpekṣakuśaladhyānāśritā prajñā vyañjananirapekṣādiviśuddhalaukikadhyānāśritā prajñā lokottaradhyānāśritā prajñā prajñā mahāprajñā ca||
2882:1991: none“> vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ prayuktena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcākārā prajñā bhāvayitavyā|
2882:1992: vyañjanasāpekṣakuśaladhyānāśritā prajñā vyañjananirapekṣādiviśuddhalaukikadhyānāśritā prajñā lokottaradhyānāśritā prajñā prajñā mahāprajñā ca||
2882:1999: none“> rūpe subhūte kalyāṇamitrasevāprayuktena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcākārayā kalyāṇamitrasevayā kalyāṇamitraṃ sevitavyam|
2882:2007: none“> vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte kalyāṇamitrasevāprayuktena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcākārayā
2882:2019: none“> evaṃ kalyāṇamitraṃ sevamāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vimokṣopāyaṃ ca parigṛhṇāti|
2882:2034: none“> rūpe subhūte tathāgatapūjāprayuktena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcākārayā tathāgatapūjayā tathāgataḥ pūjayitavyaḥ|
2882:2035: vicitrastotropahārapūjayā lābhasatkāropasaṃhārapūjayā pratipattyārādhanapūjayā pūjayā mahāpūjayā ca||
2882:2042: none“> vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte tathāgatapūjāprayuktena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcākārayā tathāgatapūjayā tathāgataḥ pūjayitavyaḥ|
2882:2047: none“> lābhasatkāropasaṃhārapūjayā pratipattyārādhanapūjayā pūjayā mahāpūjayā ca||
2882:2054: none“> evaṃ tathāgatapūjāyāṃ prayuktasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānantāparyanteṣu daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhabodhisattvā varṇaṃ bhāṣante|
2882:2065: none“> rūpe subhūte dānapāramitāyāṃ prayukto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sanimittaṃ dānaṃ bhāvayan na kṣipraṃ dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati|
2882:2066: animittaṃ tu dānaṃ bhāvayan kṣipraṃ dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati|
2882:2080: none“> bodhisattvo rūpe sanimittaṃ dānaṃ bhāvayaty animittaṃ vā|
2882:2081: sacet subhūte bodhisattvo rūpe dānam adhimucyamāno'dhimokṣyadānaṃ vopalabhate'dhimokṣadānaṃ vā sanimittaṃ bodhisattvo rūpe dānaṃ bhāvayatīti veditavyam|
2882:2082: rūpe subhūte bodhisattvo dānam adhimucyamāno nādhimokṣyadānam upalabhate nādhimokṣadānaṃ vā yad uta rūpasvabhāvānupalambhena tathābhāvānupalambhena prakṛtyanupalambhena rūpe'nimittaṃ bodhisattvo dānaṃ bhāvayatīti
2882:2093: none“> vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte dānapāramitāyāṃ prayukto bodhisattvaḥ sanimittaṃ dānaṃ bhāvayan
2882:2098: animittaṃ tu dānaṃ bhāvayan kṣipraṃ dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati|
2882:2099: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo vijñāne sanimittaṃ dānaṃ bhāvayaty animittaṃ vā|
2882:2104: none“> vijñāne dānam adhimucyamāno'dhimokṣyadānaṃ vopalabhate'dhimokṣadānaṃ vā sanimittaṃ dānaṃ bodhisattvo vijñāne bhāvayatīti veditavyam|
2882:2105: vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvo dānam adhimucyamāno nādhimokṣyadānam upalabhate nādhimokṣadānaṃ vā yad uta vijñānasvabhāvānupalambhena tathābhāvānupalambhena prakṛtyanupalambhena vijñāne'nimittaṃ bodhisattvo dānaṃ bhāvayatīti veditavyam||
2882:2118: none“> evaṃ śīle kṣāntau vīrye dhyāne prajñāyāṃ ca peyālaṃ kartavyam||
2882:2125: none“> rūpe subhūte bodhisattvena śūnyatāsamādhiḥ parijñeyaḥ|
2882:2127: yā subhūte rūpe'bhāva śūnyatāṃ tathābhāvaśūnyatāṃ prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ cālambanīkṛtya cittasyaikāgratāyaṃ rūpe śūnyatāsamādhiḥ|
2882:2128: evaṃ ca bodhisattvena rūpe śūnyatāsamādhiḥ parijñeyaḥ||
2882:2135: none“> vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvena
2882:2145: yā subhūte vijñāne'bhāvaśūnyatāṃ tathābhāvaśūnyatāṃ prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ cālambanīkṛtya
2882:2161: none“> rūpe subhūte bodhisattvenānimittaḥ samādhiḥ parijñeyaḥ|
2882:2163: yā subhūte bodhisattvasya rūpe'bhāvaśūnyatāṃ tathābhāvaśūnyatāṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām evaṃ ca manasikurvato nirud-
2882:2176: none“> dhe nimitte'bhāvanimittānusārivijñānavirahitā tathābhāvanimittānusārivijñānavirahitā bhāvābhāvanimittānusārivijñānavirahitā cittasyaikāgratāyaṃ subhūte rūpe'nimittaḥ samādhiḥ|
2882:2177: evaṃ ca bodhisattvena rūpe'nimittaḥ samādhiḥ parijñeyaḥ||
2882:2184: none“> vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvenānimittaḥ samādhiḥ parijñeyaḥ| katamaś ca
2882:2189: yā subhūte bodhisattvasya vijñāne'bhāvaśūnyatāṃ tathābhāvaśūnyatāṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām
2882:2193: none“> evaṃ ca manasikurvato niruddhe nimitte'bhāvanimittānusārivijñānavirahitā tathābhāvanimittānusārivijñānavirahitā bhāvābhāvanimittānusārivijñānavirahitā cittasyaikāgratāyaṃ
2882:2198: evaṃ ca bodhisattvena vijñāne'nimittaḥ samādhiḥ parijñeyaḥ||
2882:2205: none“> rūpe subhūte bodhisattvenāpraṇihitaḥ samādhiḥ parijñeyaḥ|
2882:2220: none“> nimittapratikūlālambanā tathābhāvanimittapratikūlālambanā bhāvābhāvanimittapratikūlālambanā cittasyaikāgratāyaṃ subhūte rūpe'praṇihitasamādhiḥ|
2882:2221: evaṃ ca bodhisattvena rūpe'praṇihitaḥ samādhiḥ parijñeyaḥ||
2882:2228: none“> vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvenāpraṇihitasamādhiḥ parijñeyaḥ|
2882:2252: none“> rūpe subhūte bodhisattvena tribhir arthair anityatā parijñeyā|
2882:2260: none“> vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvena
2882:2272: none“> rūpe subhūte bodhisattvena tribhir arthair duḥkhatā parijñeyā|
2882:2280: none“> vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvena
2882:2292: none“> rūpe subhūte bodhisattvena tribhir arthair anātmatā parijñeyā|
2882:2300: none“> vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhi-
2882:2313: none“> sattvena tribhir arthair anātmatā parijñeyā|
2882:2321: none“> rūpe subhūte bodhisattvena tribhir arthair nirvāṇaśāntatā
2882:2337: none“> vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne subhūte bodhisattvena
2882:2353: none“> idam avocad bhagavān āttamanāḥ sthavirasubhūtis tāś ca bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti||
